events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I want to return it.
The customer's message mentions a refund and return request, so assign this case to the Refund cluster.
Routing the refund case to the returns department for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket purchase. I'd be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase so I can locate the transaction and proceed with your refund?
My order number is 123456789 and I bought the jacket on May 25th. Please let me know how to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid return label attached to your shipping email. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund promptly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today. Looking forward to the refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund of the full purchase price. Please check your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can help you with today.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
